content:
Hello,

I'm in Silver Spring, MD and collaborating with folks in Catonsville, MD.
This topic was moved here from #Geographic locality > Baltimore MD and Washinton DC, USA by Ben.
I and many students learning Lean are at UMBC in Catonsville / right outside Baltimore
Do you ever meet up? I am in Potomac MD.
We meet ~weekly to discuss the projects we’re working on. This summer I’ll be leading a “Lean for Scientists and Engineers” meeting series, like I did last summer.
Ben came up to UMBC to visit us once
